DOC.brief_summary: Patients with vertebral compression fracture will be treated cement injection into the spine and monitored using standard evaluations.
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Success of Cement Treatment of Spinal Compression Fractures
DOC.detailed_description: Patients with vertebral compression fracture will be diagnosed and treated with balloon kyphoplasty. Pain and functional status will be assessed at baseline, 1-, 12-, and 24-months post-operatively using VAS pain scale, Oswestry Disability Index, and SF-36.
